HERO_SECTION.SUBTITLE: LET'S BUILD SOMETHING AMAZING TOGETHER
HERO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Partner with us to elevate your operations and drive success.

SOLUTIONS.TITLE: Our Solutions
SOLUTIONS.SUBTITLE: What we do
SOLUTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Explore our custom digital solutions that turn your ideas into game-changing results.

website-engineering.TITLE: Website Engineering
website-engineering.DESCRIPTION: We create high-performance websites tailored to your brand, offering seamless experiences, modern design, and scalable solutions.

app-development.TITLE: Custom Platform Solutions
app-development.DESCRIPTION: We create robust and secure platforms, including SaaS products and management systems, all customized to meet your unique business needs.

mobile-development.TITLE: Mobile Development
mobile-development.DESCRIPTION: We design and develop intuitive, feature-rich mobile apps for iOS and Android, combining sleek design with seamless functionality.

ai-integration.TITLE: AI-Powered Apps
ai-integration.DESCRIPTION: We integrate cutting-edge artificial intelligence into digital products to enhance user experiences and optimize business operations.

ui-ux-design.TITLE: UI/UX Design
ui-ux-design.DESCRIPTION: We craft user-centric, intuitive interfaces that drive engagement, improve usability, and deliver visually compelling digital experiences.

inception-team.TITLE: Inception Team
inception-team.DESCRIPTION: Our developers and business strategists align innovation with your business goals to deliver market-ready solutions.

WHY_US.SUBTITLE: WHY US
WHY_US.TITLE: The Synopp Advantage
WHY_US.DESCRIPTION: Discover the core strengths that make us the perfect partner for your digital journey.

agility.TITLE: Agility and Flexibility
agility.DESCRIPTION: Thriving in fast-paced environments, adapting to changing needs, delivering results without compromising quality.

client-centric.TITLE: Client-Centric Approach
client-centric.DESCRIPTION: Tailored solutions for your unique business challenges, goals, and audience, ensuring the best-fit technology for your needs.

expertise.TITLE: Interdisciplinary Expertise
expertise.DESCRIPTION: A blend of developers, strategists, and designers ensures technical excellence and strategic business value.

commitment.TITLE: Client Commitment
commitment.DESCRIPTION: Fostering long-term partnerships through transparency, collaboration, and goal alignment.

technology.TITLE: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.DESCRIPTION: Leveraging the latest tech—AI, machine learning, cloud, and mobile—to drive innovation and scalable growth.

results.TITLE: Results-Driven Focus
results.DESCRIPTION: Delivering measurable outcomes aligned with your business goals, ensuring tangible impact and long-term growth.

OUR_PROCESS.SUBTITLE: OUR PROCESS
OUR_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: We deliver excellence through our proven process.

discovery.TITLE: Discovery
discovery.DESCRIPTION: We start by fully understanding your goals, challenges, and vision to create a strong, shared foundation.

design.TITLE: Design
design.DESCRIPTION: Our design team crafts intuitive, user-centric interfaces that align with your brand and enhance user experience.

develop.TITLE: Develop
develop.DESCRIPTION: We build your solution using the latest technologies, ensuring scalability, security, and top-tier performance.

launch.TITLE: Launch
launch.DESCRIPTION: We rigorously test, refine, and launch your product, ensuring it's fully optimized for success from day one.

TECH_STACK.SUBTITLE: THE STACK WE USE
TECH_STACK.TITLE: Transforming ideas with the right technologies.
TECH_STACK.DESCRIPTION: We use the latest tools and platforms to build reliable, scalable solutions that bring your vision to life.

CONTACT_US.SUBTITLE: CONTACT US
CONTACT_US.TITLE: Take the First Step
CONTACT_US.RIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Reach out and discover what your tech partner can do for you.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE.TITLE: Message Sent!
SUCCESS_MESSAGE.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for reaching out. Our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

PROCESS_STEPS.TITLE: What happens when you book a call?
PROCESS_STEPS.DESCRIPTION: When you reach out, you get all eyes on your project. We carefully study your request to make sure we fully understand the scope.

STEP_1.TITLE: Our team receives your requirements
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: When you reach out, you get all eyes on your project. We carefully study your request to make sure we fully understand the scope.

STEP_2.TITLE: Discuss Your Needs
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: In order to learn more about your business and the challenges you face, we'll schedule a call. Our experts will dive deep into your goals and deliver actionable insights to craft the perfect solution for you.

STEP_3.TITLE: Get A Tailored Proposal
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: We'll send you a custom proposal with a clear plan, budget, and timeline—aligned with your needs.

FOOTER.CTA_TITLE_1: Ready to bring your projects to life?
FOOTER.CTA_DESCRIPTION: Our team is looking forward to meet you!

COOKIE_MODAL.TITLE: Our website uses cookies
COOKIE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: We use cookies to improve your experience on this website. You may choose which types of cookies to allow and change your preferences at any time.
COOKIE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION_PREFERENCES: We use cookies to improve your experience on this website. You may choose which types of cookies to allow and change your preferences at any time. Disabling cookies may impact your experience on this website
COOKIE_MODAL.ESSENTIAL_DESCRIPTION: Cookies required to enable basic website functionality.
COOKIE_MODAL.ANALYTICS_DESCRIPTION: Cookies used to understand how the website is being used.

GDPR_RIGHTS.TITLE: GDPR Rights
GDPR_RIGHTS.INTRO_TEXT: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights regarding your personal data processed by Synapp. To exercise any of these rights, contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO) at
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_POINT_1: Confirmation that we process your data.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_POINT_2: A copy of your personal data in a readable format.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_POINT_3: Details about the purpose, categories, and recipients of your data.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_RESPONSE_TIME: We'll respond within 1 month (extendable to 3 months for complex requests).
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_2_CONTENT: Request corrections if your data is inaccurate or incomplete.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ERASURE_EXCEPTIONS: Exceptions: We retain data if required by French law (e.g., fiscal records under
GDPR_RIGHTS.FRENCH_COMMERCIAL_CODE: Article L 123-22 of the French Commercial Code
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_4_INTRO: Ask us to temporarily restrict processing if
GDPR_RIGHTS.RESTRICT_POINT_2: Processing is unlawful but you oppose erasure.
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_5_CONTENT: Request your data in a structured, commonly used format (e.g., JSON, CSV) for transfer to another provider.
GDPR_RIGHTS.DIRECT_MARKETING_CONTENT: Unsubscribe via any marketing email or object via
GDPR_RIGHTS.LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS_CONTENT: We'll cease unless we demonstrate compelling legal grounds.
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_7_CONTENT: Synapp does not use fully automated decision-making that significantly affects users.
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_8_CONTENT: Withdraw consent anytime (e.g., newsletters). This does not affect prior lawful processing.
GDPR_RIGHTS.EMAIL_REQUIREMENT_1: Full name + proof of identity (e.g., redacted ID).
GDPR_RIGHTS.RESPONSE_TIME_CONTENT: 1 month (may extend to 3 months with notification).
GDPR_RIGHTS.NO_FEES_CONTENT: Free unless requests are manifestly unfounded or excessive.
GDPR_RIGHTS.COMPLAINTS_INTRO: If unsatisfied, lodge a complaint with
GDPR_RIGHTS.POST_NOTE: Note: For requests by post, we recommend using tracked mail.
